main event: On January 17, 1961, a light object was observed in the sky near Troy, Ohio, which crossed the sky and exploded without any sound.
interesting points: The object was visually observed and also tracked by radar., It had the appearance of a jet but was reported to be much faster., Witness described the object as circular with no colors seen., The object was reported to have disappeared and then reappeared before exploding., Attempts to contact witnesses for further analysis were unsuccessful.
witness description: observer described the object as circular, light without any colors
